channel.title: Please HELP LOOOOOK! PLease!
channel.description:
Loaded WorldMap In (78 ms)... Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:168)
I was adding new potions and everything worked but then i get this error when i run server? please help.

item.title: Please HELP LOOOOOK! PLease!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is being thrown because you didnâ€™t use tabs while editing a cfg file (as this is where the error most commonly occurs in cfg folders), or the number 6 is to high. You should go look through the CFG folder that you just recently edited for any mistakes where you pressed the space bar when you should of pressed the tabs key.

OR, I could put it like this:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException was thrown to indicate that an array was accessed with an out of bounds index.

(Hope that makes better sense).

Read full topic
